name: How to Admire NFT 101
description:
An  artwork to celebrate the 500.000++ minted objkts on HEN. I believe, every single objkt is beautiful, unique, and enchanting. So how about taking a moment to appreciate the artworks in this platform, including YOURS?

Yes, be proud of what you've created, bud! Here's how to do it:
- Open you NFT on laptop or you can choose a bigger screen for a better experience
- Stare at it for 3 mins
- Recall memories that related to your art
- Pat yourself on the shoulder and say "you're the great artist and I'm your number one fan"
- Invite one or two people to cherish the moment with you

Enjoy!
